articles.description: Top seed Jannik Sinner cruises into the French Open semi-finals with a ruthless straight-set victory over Alexander Bublik, ending the Kazakh's remarkable run in Paris.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Jannik Sinner cruises into semi-finals with victory over Alexander Bublik

articles.description: Thousands of people lined the streets on Wednesday to welcome the Royal Challengers Bengaluru.
articles.title: Eleven people die in crush at Bengaluru IPL victory parade

articles.description: It has been a chaotic 10 days for the Lionesses, with two senior players retiring and one withdrawing from selection for Euro 2025.

articles.description: The arrival of AC Milan's Tijjani Reijnders marks the start of Manchester City's summer rebuild - but can he revitalise Pep Guardiola's midfield?
articles.title: Is Tijjani Reijnders the man to revitalise Manchester City's midfield?

articles.description: Liverpool don't often spend big in the summer but the arrivals of Florian Wirtz and Milos Kerkez would take their spending past £180m already, so why are the Reds doing things differently this time?
articles.title: Liverpool: Florian Wirtz and Milos Kerkez next? Why Reds are spending big

articles.description: Chelsea defender Millie Bright makes herself unavailable for selection for England's Euro 2025 squad.

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says professional golfers are "well within our rights" to skip media duties as he admitted he was left "annoyed" by a story regarding his equipment at last month's US PGA Championship.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Masters champion 'annoyed' by equipment leak at US PGA Championship
